description: This form appends the following activity into the permitted CMIP7 Controlled Vocabularies list.\n\nThe permitted set of values are defined in the [WCRP universal constants repo](https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/WCRP-universe/activity/). If your item is missing please [register here first](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-universe/issues/new?template=activity.yml) and wait a day after it has been confirmed for this script to be remade.

label: Issue Type
description: Select whether adding new or modifying existing

label: Activity
description: Select the activities to add to CMIP7
